official_title: To provide for a demonstration project relating to treatment for drug abuse and alcohol abuse under the health benefits program for Federal employees.
subjects: Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Directs the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) to conduct, during calendar years 1992 and 1993, a demonstration project to determine the feasibility and desirability of including certain benefits relating to the treatment of drug abuse and alcohol abuse among the types of benefits provided under health insurance plans for Federal employees. Requires OPM to coordinate such project with other related programs and to make a final report to specified congressional committees. Authorizes appropriations.
